message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I know you'd get a lot of use out of it.  I'm offering it to you for $130.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a little, how about $125?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here.  $120 is my final offer, take it or leave it.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I told you my final offer was $120.  I'll give you one more chance to accept that, otherwise I'm walking.
I understand you're trying to sell the product, but I'm really not willing to go above $108. Would you be willing to meet me there?
